(close)

Keyboard shortcuts

General:
Ctrl + c: show/hide chart
c: cycle through all the charts available
Shift + c: cycle through all the charts available (backwards)

Jumping to pages:
g then i: Go to Income Statement
g then b: Go to Balance Sheet
g then t: Go to Trial Balance
g then g: Go to General Journal
g then q: Go to Custom Query

g then h: Go to Holdings
g then w: Go to Net Worth
g then d: Go to Documents
g then n: Go to Notes
g then e: Go to Events
g then c: Go to Commodities

g then s: Go to Source
g then o: Go to Options
g then x: Go to Statistics
g then r: Go to Errors
g then H: Go to Help

Source Editor:
ctrl+s: Save
cmd+s: Save (Mac)

Filtering:
f then t: Filter by Time (pull down menu)
f then g: Filter by Tag (pull down menu)
f then c: Filter by Component (pull down menu)
f then p: Filter by Payee (pull down menu)

Toggle journal entries:
l: Legs
m: Metadata
s then o: Open directives
s then c: Close directives
s then t: Transactions
s then b: Balances
s then n: Notes
s then d: Document
s then p: Pad directives

t then c: Cleared transactions
t then p: Pending transactions
t then P: Padding transactions
t then s: Summarize transactions
t then t: Transfer transactions
t then o: Other transactions

Query Editor:
ctrl+Enter: Execute query
cmd+Enter: Execute query (Mac)
